venue.name: A.M.C. Highland Center at Crawford Notch

item.description:
With the recent snow storm the mountains should look like a Winter Wonderland.!

We are planning to hike Mt Tom and Field to get re-acclimated to Winter Hiking. We plan to follow the Avalon Trail to the A-Z trail and the Mt Tom Spur trail to the summit of Mt Tom. We will them return to the A-Z trail and take the Willey Range trail to the summit of Mt Field, returning the same way.

We will meet at the Highland Center at 9:45 AM and begin our hike at 10:00 AM sharp with or without you.

Dogs are Welcome!

Distance - 7.5 miles,
Elevation Gain - 2,800 feet
Book Time 5:00 excluding stops
Goal time 5:00 including stops


We will hike at or slightly faster than booktime with limited short stops in order to stay warm and limit the amount of hiking after dark.

Be prepared for full Winter conditions - snowshoes, microspikes, goggles, extra gloves/clothes may all be needed.

If you have any questions on equipement or the hike please ask before showing up for the hike.


As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree to the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com; the leader(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you release, hold harmless, and indemnify the leader(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in a green Suburban with NH plates and ROT & VFTT decals - We will be inside the Highland Center by the fireplace until 9:45 AM.
item.name: Winter Season Warmup - Mt Tom & Field
